basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period time
basic.color: Leaf color green, Flower color yellow green

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunlight, avoid direct strong light in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when the soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
